p: Selected EOs showed different degrees of activity, with MIC values ranging from 0.5% ( T. vulgaris and O. vulgare) to > 10% ( C. sinensis, C. paradisi, C. aurantium, C. limon). The most effective EOs contained large amounts (52.6%) of thymol ( T. vulgaris) and carvacrol (65.9% and 20.8%) ( O. vulgare and O. majorana, respectively). More detailed data are reported in Table 2.
